titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records relating to the Catherine Street Ferry 1991.019
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-21T16:01-0500

did.unittitle: Records relating to the Catherine Street Ferry
did.abstract: The collection contains six proposals and one letter of recommendation which were submitted to the Common Council of Brooklyn in 1801 for the operation of the Catherine Street Ferry for three years beginning on May 1, 1801.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Catherine and Main Street Ferry Company (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.).

prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Records relating to the Catherine Street Ferry, 1991.019, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
